chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), exd m x -> eqc m x x

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
eqc = fix eqc (m : fmap) (x y : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x = x0 /\ y = x0 \/ eqc m0 x y | L m0 _ x0 y0 => eqc m0 x y \/ eqc m0 x x0 /\ eqc m0 y0 y \/ eqc m0 x y0 /\ eqc m0 x0 y end : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
eqc_exd_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> exd m x /\ exd m y
eqc_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), {eqc m x y} + {~ eqc m x y}
MA0.card_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> card (MA0.Iter_orb m x) = MA0.Iter_upb m x
B_1_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B_1 m k x = m
MA0.upb_sum_bound : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MA0.expo m x y -> (MA0.Iter_upb m x + MA0.Iter_upb m y <= ndN m)%nat
MF.disjs_orb : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MF.expo m x y -> disjs (MF.Iter_orb m x) (MF.Iter_orb m y)
MA0.incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
MF.incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MF.Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
MF.exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (MF.Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
MA0.exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (MA0.Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
MF.incls_minus : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MF.expo m x y -> let s := fmap_to_set m in let sx := MF.Iter_orb m x in let sy := MF.Iter_orb m y in incls sy (set_minus s sx)
MA0.incls_minus : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ MA0.expo m x y -> let s := fmap_to_set m in let sx := MA0.Iter_orb m x in let sy := MA0.Iter_orb m y in incls sy (set_minus s sx)
prec_I = fun (m : fmap) (x : dart) => x <> nil /\ ~ exd m x : fmap -> dart -> Prop
MA1.L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MA1.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MA1.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
MF.L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MF.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MF.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
prec_L = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart) => exd m x /\ exd m y /\ ~ succ m k x /\ ~ pred m k y /\ cA m k x <> y : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> Prop
MA0.L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MA0.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
MA1.L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MA1.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MA1.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (MA1.Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
MF.L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MF.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MF.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (MF.Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
MF.PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MF.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MF.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (MF.Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
MA0.PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (MA0.f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (MA0.Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
pred = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A_1 m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
MA1.exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA1.diff_orb m z
exd_cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA_1 m k z) -> exd m z
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
MA1.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> McA1.f_1 m (McA1.f m z) = z
MF.f_1_f : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> McF.f_1 m (McF.f m z) = z
succ_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k z -> exd m z

```coq
```coq
intros m x H.
induction m.
- inversion H.
- inversion H.
  ++ apply eqc_exd_exd.
    ++ assumption.
    ++ assumption.
  ++ apply IHm.
    ++ assumption.
    ++ assumption.
Qed.```
